intro: Noccaea annua, commonly known as common honesty, is an annual flowering plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. It belongs to the family Brassicaceae, which includes many other cruciferous plants. The plant is characterized by its small, white flowers and heart-shaped leaves. It typically grows in disturbed soils and is often found in fields and along roadsides. Noccaea annua is also known for its historical use in herbal medicine.
